title: UK unemployment falls by 7,000 to 1.6m - BBC News
text:
UK unemployment falls by 7,000 to 1.6m 15 February 2017 Read more about sharing. Close share panel UK unemployment fell by 7,000 to 1.6m in three months to December, while average earnings rose 2.6%, figures show
